channel.title: Elixir With Tdd on Krishna Kumar T
channel.description: Recent content in Elixir With Tdd on Krishna Kumar T

item.title: CLI Poker Game
item.description: A simple CLI poker game mix test - to run the tests mix excript.build - to compile ./poker - runs the application Example run ./poker Black: 2H 3C 4H 5D TC White: 2H 3C 4H 5D TC tie Black: 2H 3C 4H 5D TC White: 2H 3C 4H 5D KC White is winner - highcard: K Black: 2H 3C 4H KD KC White: 2H 3C 4H KD KC tie Black: 2H 3C 4H KD KC White: 2H 3C 5H KD KC White is winner - pair: 5 Black: 1H 3C 5H KD KC White: 2H 3C 5H KD KC Invalid input from Black
